info.name: Roblox Old Dark Theme (Work In Progress)
info.description:
This is a remake of the roblox dark theme, From February 2nd 2019, to September 28th, 2019
Rest in peac.... Wait! the theme is back! (It's global bc idk how to make it just roblox)
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1
*Made the theme not global
*Rewrote the code
*Hid the giftcards tab
*Fixed The Upgrade Now Button
*Gamecards Have borders on the bottom!
